Class InventoryManager

java.lang.Object
com.group6.hms.app.managers.inventory.InventoryManager
public class InventoryManager extends Object
The InventoryManager class manages the medication inventory for the system, including medication stock levels and replenishment requests. It provides methods for pharmacists and administrators to manage stock levels, submit and approve replenishment requests, and monitor low stock levels.

    • getAllMedicationStock

      public List<MedicationStock> getAllMedicationStock()
      Retrieves all medication stock records.
      Returns:
      a List of all MedicationStock objects in the inventory

    • getMedicationStock

      public MedicationStock getMedicationStock(Medication medication)
      Retrieves the stock information for a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medication - the Medication to search for
      Returns:
      the MedicationStock object for the specified medication, or null if not found

    • getMedicationStock

      public MedicationStock getMedicationStock(String medicationName)
      Retrieves the stock information for a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - the String of the medication to search for
      Returns:
      the MedicationStock object for the specified medication, or null if not found

    • getAllMedication

      public List<Medication> getAllMedication()
      Retrieves a list of all medications in the system, excluding their stock quantities. This method is intended for doctors to select medications for prescriptions.
      Returns:
      a List of Medication objects without stock information

    • getReplenishmentRequestById

      public ReplenishmentRequest getReplenishmentRequestById(String requestId)
      Retrieves a specific replenishment request by its ID.
      Parameters:
      requestId - the ID of the replenishment request
      Returns:
      the ReplenishmentRequest object with the specified ID, or null if not found

    • submitReplenishmentRequest

      public void submitReplenishmentRequest(List<ReplenishmentRequest> requests)
      Submits a list of replenishment requests for administrator approval. This method is intended for pharmacists to request stock replenishment.
      Parameters:
      requests - a List of ReplenishmentRequest objects to submit

    • decreaseMedicationStock

      public void decreaseMedicationStock(Medication med, int amountUsed)
      Decreases the stock level of a specified medication by a given amount. This method is used by pharmacists when dispensing medication.
      Parameters:
      med - the Medication to decrease stock for
      amountUsed - the amount to decrease the stock by

    • approveReplenishmentRequest

      public void approveReplenishmentRequest(ReplenishmentRequest request)
      Approves a replenishment request submitted by a pharmacist and updates the medication stock. This method is intended for administrators to fulfill replenishment requests.
      Parameters:
      request - the ReplenishmentRequest to approve

    • addMedicationStocks

      public void addMedicationStocks(List<MedicationStock> medicationStock)
      Adds a list of medication stock items to the medication stock storage. This method takes a list of MedicationStock objects and iterates through each item, adding it to the storage provider using the `addNewItem` method. This process helps ensure each medication stock item in the list is stored individually.
      Parameters:
      medicationStock - List<MedicationStock> objects to be added to the storage.

    • getReplenishmentRequestByStatus

      public List<ReplenishmentRequest> getReplenishmentRequestByStatus(ReplenishmentRequestStatus status)
      Retrieves all replenishment requests with a specific status. This method is intended for administrators to view requests by status.
      Parameters:
      status - the ReplenishmentRequestStatus to filter requests by
      Returns:
      a List of ReplenishmentRequest objects with the specified status

    • getAllReplenishmentRequest

      public List<ReplenishmentRequest> getAllReplenishmentRequest()
      Retrieves all replenishment requests in the system. This method is intended for administrators to view all replenishment requests.
      Returns:
      a List of all ReplenishmentRequest objects

    • isStockLow

      public boolean isStockLow(MedicationStock medicationStock)
      Checks if the stock level of a specific medication is below the defined low stock limit.
      Parameters:
      medicationStock - the MedicationStock to check
      Returns:
      true if the stock level is below the low stock limit, false otherwise
